Engine

Class SegmentedBar

  • java.lang.Object
    • Engine.SegmentedBar

  • public class SegmentedBar
extends java.lang.Object
    Maintains a segmented horizontal Segment bar
    Author:
    Michael Letter

    • Field Detail

      • vertical

        public boolean vertical
        if True the Bar will be Drawn Vertically. Otherwise it will be drawn horizontal

      • useImages

        public boolean useImages
        If True, when drawn will be drawn with the given textures rather than this rectangles color. If False, the bar will be drawn with the current color

      • resources

        public static ResourceHandler resources

      • center

        public Vector2 center

      • setImage

      • setSpriteSheet

        public void setSpriteSheet(java.lang.String spriteFilename,
                           int width,
                           int height,
                           int totalFrames,
                           int ticksPerFrame)
        Sets up the spritesheet animation. Will not do anything if width, height, or totalFrame are less than 0.
        Parameters:
        spriteFilename - Filename of the spritesheet image
        width - Width of individual sprite.
        height - Height of individual sprite.
        totalFrames - Total sprites in spritesheet
        ticksPerFrame - How long each sprite remains before the next is drawn.

      • setSpriteSheet

        public void setSpriteSheet(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image,
                           int width,
                           int height,
                           int totalFrames,
                           int ticksPerFrame)
        Sets up the spritesheet animation. Will not do anything if width, height, or totalFrame are less than 0.
        Parameters:
        image - The bufferedTexture (image) of the spritesheet
        width - Width of individual sprite.
        height - Height of individual sprite.
        totalFrames - Total sprites in spritesheet
        ticksPerFrame - How long each sprite remains before the next is drawn.

      • setAnimationPauseStatus

        public void setAnimationPauseStatus(boolean pause)
        pauses the sprite animation on this object.
        Parameters:
        pause - true to pause the animation.

      • setUsingSpriteSheet

        public void setUsingSpriteSheet(boolean on)
        Enable/disable the spritesheet animation on this object.
        Parameters:
        on - True: use sprite sheet animation, False: do not use sprite sheet animation

      • setToDrawOutline

        public void setToDrawOutline(boolean onlyOutlined)
        controls the drawing of the GameObject to only drawing outline or not. Default: fills.
        Parameters:
        onlyOutlined - if true only draws outlined, otherwise draws regular (filled)

        public boolean usingSpriteSheet()

      • setAnimationMode

        public void setAnimationMode(int firstFrame,
                             int lastFrame,
                             Rectangle.SpriteSheetAnimationMode animationMode)
        Sets the mode of animation for the spritesheet animation. Will do nothing if firstFrame or lastFrame is less than 0. During the animation, if LastFrame exceeds mTotalFrames, an error will occur.
        Parameters:
        firstFrame - First frame in the spritesheet to animate.
        lastFrame - Last frame in the spritesheet to animate.
        animationMode - The type of animation that will be followed.

      • isAnimationPaused

        public boolean isAnimationPaused()
        Gets the animation pause state
        Returns:
        True if animation is paused
